I spent my birthday alone, but I still made it a relaxing and enjoyable day.
i just moved to los angeles from tokyo.

content.text: It's going well, thank you! I just moved to LA from Tokyo, so I'm still getting used to everything.
Oh, that's exciting! I've always wanted to visit Japan. What do you like most about LA so far?
I love the weather! It's so much warmer and sunnier than Tokyo. And I'm really enjoying exploring all the different neighborhoods.
That's great! I'm sure you'll have a lot of fun here. What are some of your hobbies?
I love to read, write, and paint. I also like to go to concerts and movies.
Those are all great hobbies! I love to read and go to concerts too.
Nice! What kind of books do you like to read?
I love to read horror novels, but I also enjoy reading nonfiction and biographies.
I love horror movies! I'm a big fan of Stephen King.
Me too! He's one of my favorite authors.
Have you read any of his new books?
I haven't yet, but I'm planning on reading "The Outsider" soon.
I've heard good things about that book. I'm excited to read it too.
Me too! It looks like it's going to be a good one.
